title: Blended Learning Program for Enhancing Critical Thinking Skills in Virtual Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Sociological Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing critical thinking application for in-service practitioners to solve workplace social issues, combining asynchronous learning with personal devices and monthly face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can identify logical fallacies and propose alternative interpretations when analyzing diverse social issues.
Through PBL activities, learners can structure problems requiring real-world case studies, propose solutions, and incorporate peer feedback.
Learners can construct evidence-based arguments and pose critical questions to others' opinions on online discussion boards.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
